results.title: Simvastatin Prevents Liver Microthrombosis and Sepsis Induced Coagulopathy in a Rat Model of Endotoxemia
results.text_hl: Background: @DISEASE_Endotoxemia @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@Endotoxemia@@@ causes @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ and microthrombosis, which are pathogenic mechanisms of @DISEASE_Blood_Coagulation_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001778 @@@coagulopathy@@@ and @DISEASE_Multiple_Organ_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D009102 @@@organ failure@@@ during @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ has potential anti-@<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombotic@@@ effects on liver endothelial cells.

citations.NLM: La Mura V, Gagliano N, Arnaboldi F, Sartori P, Procacci P, Denti L, Liguori E, Bitto N, Ristagno G, Latini R, Dondossola D, Salerno F, Tripodi A, Colombo M, Peyvandi F. Simvastatin Prevents Liver Microthrombosis and Sepsis Induced Coagulopathy in a Rat Model of Endotoxemia Cells. 2022 Mar 29;11(7):. PMID: 35406712
citations.BibTeX: @article{35406712, title={Simvastatin Prevents Liver Microthrombosis and Sepsis Induced Coagulopathy in a Rat Model of Endotoxemia}, author={La Mura V and Gagliano N and Arnaboldi F and Sartori P and Procacci P and Denti L and Liguori E and Bitto N and Ristagno G and Latini R and Dondossola D and Salerno F and Tripodi A and Colombo M and Peyvandi F}, journal={Cells}, volume={11}, number={7}}

results.title: Deep venous thrombosis in an individual with statin-exposed anti-SRP myopathy: case report and review of literature
results.text_hl: After @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathic@@@ management, discontinuation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, and anticoagulant treatment ultrasonography revealed only partial @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombosis@@@ in left femoral @DISEASE_Stenosis_Pulmonary_Vein @DISEASE_MESH:D000071078 @@@vein@@@ (Fig. 2D).

citations.NLM: Li J, Yan M, Qin J, He L, Dai C, Wen R. Deep venous thrombosis in an individual with statin-exposed anti-SRP myopathy: case report and review of literature Thromb J. 2021 Nov 25;19(1):92. PMID: 34823539

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates the endothelial pro-thrombotic shift in saphenous vein grafts induced by Advanced glycation endproducts.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuates the endothelial pro-@<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombotic@@@ shift in saphenous vein grafts induced by @CHEMICAL_Glycation_End_Products_Advanced @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017127 @@@Advanced glycation endproducts@@@.

citations.NLM: Spadaccio C, De Marco F, Di Domenico F, Coccia R, Lusini M, Barbato R, Covino E, Chello M. Simvastatin attenuates the endothelial pro-thrombotic shift in saphenous vein grafts induced by Advanced glycation endproducts. Thromb Res. 2014 Mar;133(3):418-25. PMID: 24388572

results.title: Preoperative lipid-control with simvastatin reduces the risk of postoperative thrombocytosis and thrombotic complications following CABG.
results.text_hl: Preoperative @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-control with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces the risk of @DISEASE_Thrombocytosis @DISEASE_MESH:D013922 @@@postoperative thrombocytosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombotic complications@@@ following CABG.

citations.NLM: Christenson JT. Preoperative lipid-control with simvastatin reduces the risk of postoperative thrombocytosis and thrombotic complications following CABG. Eur J Cardiothorac Surg. 1999 Apr;15(4):394-9; discussion 399-400. PMID: 10371111

results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates deep vein thrombosis in rabbits by regulating the fibrinolytic system.
results.text_hl: @GENE_SELP @GENE_100009534 @@@P-selectin@@@ expression in the venous wall was measured with immunohistochemistry, and quantitative PCR detected the changes of local @GENE_SERPINE1 @GENE_100009588 @@@PAI-1@@@/@GENE_PLAU @GENE_100008633 @@@u-PA@@@ expression. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Heparin_Low_Molecular_Weight @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006495 @@@LMWH@@@ reduced the weight of the @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombus@@@ and promoted @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombus@@@ dissolution.

citations.NLM: Feng Y, Zhang F, Niu L, Zhang M. Simvastatin ameliorates deep vein thrombosis in rabbits by regulating the fibrinolytic system. Blood Coagul Fibrinolysis. 2016 Jul;27(5):531-41. PMID: 27273142

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits the pro-inflammatory and pro-thrombotic effects of IL-17 and TNF-alpha on endothelial cells.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ inhibits the pro-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and pro-@<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombotic@@@ effects of @GENE_IL17A @GENE_3605 @@@IL-17@@@ and @GENE_TNF @GENE_7124 @@@TNF-alpha@@@ on endothelial cells.

citations.NLM: Hot A, Lavocat F, Lenief V, Miossec P. Simvastatin inhibits the pro-inflammatory and pro-thrombotic effects of IL-17 and TNF-alpha on endothelial cells. Ann Rheum Dis. 2013 May;72(5):754-60. PMID: 22915623

results.title: [Atherosclerosis and simvastatin: new questions for the new millennium].
results.text_hl: Beyond @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ reduction, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ exerts many favorable effects on endothelial function, @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ activity, expression of pro-@<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombotic@@@ factors and oxidative stress, yielding a rational basis for its important clinical positive effects, both in primary and secondary prevention of @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Tubaro M, Guido V, Sciarra L, Mustilli M, Carbone MA, D'Errico F. [Atherosclerosis and simvastatin: new questions for the new millennium]. Ann Ital Med Int. 2000 Jan-Mar;15(1):108-14. PMID: 10842900
citations.BibTeX: @article{10842900, title={[Atherosclerosis and simvastatin: new questions for the new millennium].}, author={Tubaro M and Guido V and Sciarra L and Mustilli M and Carbone MA and D'Errico F}, journal={Ann Ital Med Int}, volume={15}, number={1}, pages={108-14}}

results.title: The effects of hydroxy-methyl-glutaryl co-enzyme A reductase inhibitors on platelet thrombus formation.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: HMG CoA RI therapy with @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@PTF@@@ after only 8 weeks of therapy.

citations.NLM: Thompson PD, Moyna NM, White CM, Weber KM, Giri S, Waters DD. The effects of hydroxy-methyl-glutaryl co-enzyme A reductase inhibitors on platelet thrombus formation. Atherosclerosis. 2002 Apr;161(2):301-6. PMID: 11888512

results.title: Simvastatin depresses blood clotting by inhibiting activation of prothrombin, factor V, and factor XIII and by enhancing factor Va inactivation.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ depresses @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@blood clotting@@@ by inhibiting activation of @GENE_F2 @GENE_2147 @@@prothrombin@@@, @GENE_F5 @GENE_2153 @@@factor V@@@, and @GENE_F13A1 @GENE_2162 @@@factor XIII@@@ and by enhancing factor Va inactivation.

citations.NLM: Undas A, Brummel KE, Musial J, Mann KG, Szczeklik A. Simvastatin depresses blood clotting by inhibiting activation of prothrombin, factor V, and factor XIII and by enhancing factor Va inactivation. Circulation. 2001 May 8;103(18):2248-53. PMID: 11342472

results.title: Simvastatin reduces platelet-endocardium adhesion in atrial fibrillation.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Chronic @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@ acutely upregulates @GENE_CD40 @GENE_958 @@@CD40@@@ expression as well as platelet adhesion to the endocardium. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ is effective in modulating this expression, thus it may potentially contribute to reduce the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@intra-atrial thrombus@@@ formation.

citations.NLM: Chello M, Spadaccio C, Patti G, Lusini M, Barbato R, Goffredo C, Di Sciascio G, Covino E. Simvastatin reduces platelet-endocardium adhesion in atrial fibrillation. Atherosclerosis. 2008 Apr;197(2):588-95. PMID: 17904146
